author: James Joyce
text: Dear Stannie: Eileen and the children stayed here 4 days. I paid for that and also 2nd class and cabin fares to Dublin about 3000 francs in all. They left for Dublin just a fortnight ago today but I never heard from them that they had arrived nor do I know where they are. I hope things are going well with you. Schmitz was given a dinner here last night by the Pen Club. Jim
